verbs.description: Oil traders [V: must] become especially attentive to Donald Trump 's Twitter feed over the coming weeks , an analyst said Monday .
[ARG1: Oil traders] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: become] [ARG2: especially attentive to Donald Trump 's Twitter feed] [ARGM-TMP: over the coming weeks] , an analyst said Monday .
Oil traders must become especially attentive to Donald Trump 's Twitter feed over the [V: coming] [ARG1: weeks] , an analyst said Monday .
Oil traders must become especially attentive to Donald Trump 's Twitter feed over the coming weeks , [ARG0: an analyst] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] .
